Questions.Label: Does your organisation have a team responsible for developing and delivering training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Training includes things like:

  • training of technical skills
  • apprenticeships
  • work based training
  • commercial training

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has a team responsible for developing and delivering training

Questions.Label: Does your organisation have someone responsible for developing and delivering training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This person is you if you're the only person in your organisation.

Training includes things like:

  • training of technical skills
  • apprenticeships
  • work based training
  • commercial training

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has someone responsible for developing and delivering training

Questions.Label: Does your organisation have someone responsible for developing and delivering training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This person is you if you're the only person in your organisation.

Training includes things like:

  • apprenticeships
  • work based training
  • commercial training

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has someone responsible for developing and delivering training

Questions.Label: Who has the team worked with to develop and deliver training?

Options.Value: Employers - to deliver training to their employees
Options.Label: Employers - to deliver training to their employees

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us who the team worked with to develop and deliver training

Conditions.MustEqual: Employers - to deliver training to their employees

Pages.Title: Tell us who's the overall manager for this team
Pages.LinkTitle: Tell us who's the overall manager for this team

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us who the overall manager is for this team and how much experience in developing and delivering training they have

Validations.Name: MaxLength
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a full name using 255 characters or less

Questions.Label: How much experience do they have in developing and delivering training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This experience can be from either:

  • your organisation
  • previous employment

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how much experience they have in developing and delivering training

Pages.BodyText: This must be someone who is accountable for the team responsible for developing and delivering training.

Questions.Label: Who has this person worked with to develop and deliver training?

Options.Value: Employers - to deliver training to their employees
Options.Label: Employers - to deliver training to their employees

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us who this person worked with to develop and deliver training

Conditions.MustEqual: Employers - to deliver training to their employees

Pages.Title: How has the team worked with other organisations to develop and deliver training?
Pages.LinkTitle: How has the team worked with other organisations to develop and deliver training?

Questions.Label: How has the team worked with other organisations to develop and deliver training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how:

  • training needs were identified
  • training was determined for the right solution
  • learning objectives were identified and measured
  • training was developed from learning objectives
  • learning objectives will be delivered to apprentices

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how the team worked with other organisations to develop and deliver training

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less
